docs.snippet: With their World Cup fates already in jeopardy, Uruguay and England will be counting on their unpredictable strikers to revive their campaigns in Sao Paulo on Thursday.

docs.snippet: Brazil reinforced security personnel at the World Cup's Castelao stadium in Fortaleza on Tuesday because there were not enough private security guards hired by FIFA, the international soccer governing body, the justice ministry said.

docs.snippet: The must-win World Cup encounter between England and Uruguay could boil down to which team best targets Luis Suarez. Both former champions realize a loss Thursday could signal the end of their World Cup campaign after just two matches.
